name: Notification of Addition of Service/Resource on Appointment
description: Notification sent when a new service or resource has been added to an existing appointment
businessPurpose: Notify systems when new services or resources are added to existing appointments for proper coordination and resource management
timing: Sent when a new service or resource is added to an existing appointment that has not yet been completed
realWorldScenarios: Anesthesiologist added to surgical procedure requiring general anesthesia
Interpreter services added for non-English speaking patient appointment
Specialized equipment added to procedure due to patient complexity
Additional nursing support added for high-risk patient procedure
Ultrasound service added to routine gynecology appointment
Social worker consultation added to pediatric appointment

generationRules.AIS: Service addition details (new service being added)
generationRules.AIG: Resource group addition details if applicable
generationRules.AIP: Personnel addition details (new staff being added)
generationRules.requiredDataQuality: High - accurate service/resource addition prevents scheduling conflicts and ensures proper care delivery
